ingredients: 12 ounces Yukon Gold potatoes, peeled and quartered
1 1/2 pounds assorted mushrooms (brown, oyster, portobello), thinly sliced
instructions: Combine half-and-half, water, salt, and potatoes in a large saucepan; bring to a boil. Reduce heat and simmer 18 minutes or until potatoes are tender.
Meanwhile, melt butter in a stockpot over medium-high heat. Add onion and garlic to pan; saute 3 minutes. Add mushrooms; saute 5 minutes. Add broth; bring to a boil.
Add potato mixture to mushroom mixture; puree in batches. Garnish with chopped fresh thyme if desired.
title: Creamy Mushroom Soup

Reduce heat and simmer 18 minutes or until potatoes are tender.
Meanwhile, melt butter in a stockpot over medium-high heat.
Add onion and garlic to pan; saute 3 minutes.
Add broth; bring to a boil.
Add potato mixture to mushroom mixture; puree in batches.
Garnish with chopped fresh thyme if desired.
